body:
Hi, I am not able to build my application using lates Cython version (0.27.3)
Does somebody have any idea how to fix that ? 
thanks 

comment_data.body: seems like this is a bug: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48477845/x11-importerror-no-module-named-kivy-core-window-window-x11

title: Failed to build application: 'WindowInfoX11' is not a type identifier
